answers.answer: If you don't mind me asking why were you induced? I have been induced with my 2 kids and will be with this one due to complications. If it was just because you were late they probably won't but the only way to know for sure is to ask your doctor. Good luck

My first was due to gestational diabetes at 39 weeks & bcuz my doctor said I was young. (19)  my second one I went past 40 weeks so they scheduled a induction date. But I feel her so low. Tuesday ill be 28 weeks.
What does that mean an wouldn't that hurt you or the baby??

question: I'm due October 1st. but I really hope she comes early. I was induced with both of my sons. anyone know if bcuz of the reasons they were induced that I can request an induction for her?
title: I'm hope she's early
